The outfit is cute and fits my son well. However I did notice a lot of loose thread on the pants. One of the buttons came off because of the loose thread. I do recommend enforcing the buttons on the pants for the suspenders. Overall great outfit.
My nephew is gonna look so cute in it

Very disappointed in this product. Delivery took two weeks and then was postponed last minute for another two days, meaning we didn’t receive the outfit in time for the event we needed it for. Once arrived I was also disappointed in the cheap material and quality of the outfit. Not a great value for the price and will be returned.
The fit and quality is great!
This fits true to size. Color is very nice and we love how the bow attaches.

Fit my 4.5 year old great. We went with the 3-4t since my son is on the smaller side, fit perfectly! I will say the suspenders were a little tight so we opted to not use them, plus he wore a vest over the shirt anyways. But the bow tie, shirt and pants were perfect!
Great quality! Used as a costume for Halloween but definitely will be using again for a formal dinner/party. My son is 3 1/2 years old and it fit him perfectly 👌

I have a 4 year old who usually wears 5T and this set fits perfect for him. He is very slim so I would not recommend this for chunky kiddos. My son weighs around 40 pounds but he is the height of a 5 year old. Looks great on him, and it is great quality, I will use this for NYE (I live in HI), good fabric for weddings at the beach too. I do recommend this product and seller.  Unable to upload pictures, item is as pictured!

Bought for my 14 month old son.. although it is VERY cute, it just didn’t last. As soon as I was putting the pants on one of the back buttons for the suspenders just fell off. 20 minutes later and another button in the front fell off as well. Would return if I could.

Great price, okay quality but it’s okay bc kids will only use it couple of times and grow some more. Comfortable too.
Super cute! Fits alright. The shirt fits, but the pants are way too long for the size we ordered. The fabric holds up to toddling. Would recommend. Just know that you may need to hem pants up.

The set includes a dress shirt, bowtie, and long suspender pants, giving a polished, classic look. The fabric is soft and comfortable for toddlers, making it suitable for wearing throughout a wedding or special event. The adjustable suspenders ensure a good fit, and the overall design is stylish yet practical. Sizing might run slightly small, so it’s best to check measurements before ordering.

My son needed a cute dress outfit for an upcoming wedding, and I couldn't resist the little bow tie and suspenders on this one! Unlike many of the similar options, this set can be separated (the shirt is not attached to the pants), which I liked.  It's also mostly cotton, which feels better on his skin than polyester. The sizing seems good, too.  Super cute and comfy!

Got this for my six month old son who is on the chunkier side. We went with the 12-18months and all though it was a little big on him , i feel like it still fit him great. He is 22 pounds and normally in 9 months clothes but depending on brand I’ve seen him fit 12 month. I love that it came with everything

This outfit is so cute! It is great quality and fits my little guy perfectly. The little bow tie and suspenders are precious!  The tie easily snaps on and the suspenders are easy to attach. The fabric is soft and comfortable and the price is amazing for such a high quality and adorable set.  I highly recommend this. It would make a nice gift and is perfect for any formal occasion.
True to size good quality.  What you see is what you get. Great for the price!

Super cute and sweet little outfit. Very dressy looking, great fit and very good quality.
This is a very nice looking set of dressy boy's clothes. The suspenders are adjustable. The fabric is a comfortable cotton blend. Nice fit.

Very stylish boys outfit . My son finds a bow very attractive, it’s just makes this look so complete. I like how light material is. Great for fall weather, perfect outfit for any occasion or family gather . awesome for photoshoot ! It fits 2 years old perfect, size is correct. Also, every bottom and every stitch is a high level work. It definitely worth money paid for it. After washing it in washing machine, it didn’t ruin it at all. I highly recommend washing on cool cycle. Definitely a great purchase.
